entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Should Validator.Validate treat non-nullable reference types as required? #61441
  • Avoid keep triggering gen 2 GCs because of low ephemeral space #61428
  • [API Proposal]: Regex.Count #61425
    7.0.0
  • Hoisting the invariant out of multi-level nested loops #61420
  • UserSecrets should be optional by default #61418
    6.0.0
  • Crash on WindowsCryptographicException on net60 GA #61417
  • Garbage Collection Causes Crash #61416
  • [MonoVM] Profiled AOT generates "empty" shared libraries #61415
    7.0.0
  • Proxy-Support header case sensitive causes proxied API failure when using HttpClient #61414
  • JIT: Optimize "X & 1 == 0" to "X & 1" #61412
    Future
  • Socket.BeginConnect in .NET 6 throws an unobserved SocketException #61411
  • FileInfo reports wrong attributes on OSX #61409
  • Implement proper UInt64 and Int64 marshaling in the WASM bindings #61404
    Future
  • DynamicObject: Is it possible to customize null propagation operator behavior for dynamic object? #61401
  • CryptoStream.Read bytes truncated #61398
  • [API Proposal]: `Convert.ToInt32` overload that takes a `ROS<char>` instead of a `string` #61397
  • FileStream constructor throws UnauthorizedAccessException with no clear cause #61395
    Future
  • Test failure Loader\\classloader\\TypeGeneratorTests\\TypeGeneratorTest942\\Generated942\\Generated942.cmd #61391
  • [API Proposal]: Detecting whether we are in NativeAOT reflection-free mode. #61387

Closed

  • MetadataLoadContext can't find attributes #61402
    Future
  • superpmi: create asm diffs AzDO pipeline #59445
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: JsonSerializer.TryReadValue(ref Utf8JsonReader) #29902
    Future
  • [DllImportGenerator] Fix inconsistencies in signature of updated p/invokes #61062
    7.0.0
  • Source build leg is timing out in official build #61378
  • [API Proposal]: Add extensions to `SecureString` to improve it use. #61426
  • wasm aot compilation failed for BlazorFluentUI.CoreComponents #61352
  • Expose an attribute to allow sizing a fixed sized buffer based on type and element count. #12320
    Future
  • [wasm] Surface errors from `emcc --version`, like missing python #61067
  • [wasm] Wasm.Build.Tests: cannot test net5.0 projects with rc* sdk currently #59538
    Future
  • Arity of interface does not equal arity of implementation type #61407
  • .NET Standard 2.1 vs .NET 6 Threading in Blazor WASM #61381
  • [Proposal] SqlBulkCopy : Improve exception that is thrown when value conversion fails #61356
  • dotnet --list-sdks and --info don't show all versions (dotnet version 6.0.100 arm64) #61400
  • Code inefficiencies in loop array indexing #35618
    Future
  • Blazor Web Assembly build failed .Net 6 RC1 MONO_PATH doesn't exist or has wrong permissions #61227
  • Help requested: How to remove ReadyToRun native code from DLL? (for app size trimming) #56699
    Future
  • TryGetNonEnumeratedCount should return a count for IReadOnlyCollection<T> #61396
  • RuntimeInformation.FrameworkDescription has changed behavior in .NET 6? #61394
  • OnAfterRenderAsync code not executed #61255
    7.0.0
  • Enums are not considered blittable by Emscripten / Blazor WASM AOT #61144

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] The 6.0 branch is no longer pre-release #61442
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Test out triggering full runtime and runtime staging pipelines manually #61440
  • PKCS#8 and SPKI PEM Exports #61439
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Remove pre-release version iteration #61438
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update previous netcoreapp version to run API Compat against 6.0 ref pack #61437
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • make System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates compliant with interop guidelines - part 3 #61435
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Add JsonSerializerOptions.Default #61434
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Include the "TargetingPack" folder in the mobile apps. #61432
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Provide locations for src-gen diagnostic output #61430
    area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • Update the ref pack version to 6.0.0 for apicompat #61429
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [Mono] WIP: Fix android rolling build failures #61421
    area-System.Net, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Some more precise debug info improvements #61419
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • System.IO files cleanup #61413
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0.1] Support async operations on unseekable files #61410
    Servicing-consider, area-System.IO, 6.0.1
  • Fix perf issues discovered in "For software performance, can you always trust inlining" blog #61408
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable CI blocking test #61403
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] [wasm] Allow enums in unmanaged callbacks. #61393
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, 6.0.x
  • [wasm][debugger] Rework memory stream management #61392
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Clean up tests under Interop/PInvoke/BestFitMapping #61390
    area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Use DllImportGenerator in System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter #61389
    area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Remove SupportedOSPlatformAttribute("windows") from LdapSessionOption #61388
    area-System.DirectoryServices, new-api-needs-documentation

Merged

  • [wasm][debugger] Cleanup unused code. #61427
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [DllImportGenerator] Initialize by-value out array to default #61431
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Create superpmi-asmdiffs pipeline #61194
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Build improvements #61276
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Fix inconsistency in p/invoke arguments introduced when switching some to be blittable #61071
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Baseline two failing tests to make outerloop green again #61280
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Update timeout for sourcebuild #61436
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix common workflow issues #61027
    community-contribution
  • [wasm] fix lint issue #61433
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0.1] add support for macOS 12 #61028
    Servicing-approved, area-Host, 6.0.1
  • [release/6.0.x] Add System.Diagnostics.StackFrame.GetMethodInfoFromNativeIP API for VS4Mac #61298
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.1
  • [release/6.0][wasm] Change dotnet.wasm link optimization #60632
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 6.0.1
  • Fix credscan bugs release/5.0 #61371
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net
  • Delete unused mono_unbox_int #61384
    community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Correct the endian swapping and string implementation #61386
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] Add task marshaling tests. #61324
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Change WASM direct heap access to use helper functions #61355
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [arm64] JIT: Enable CSE/hoisting for "arrayBase + elementOffset" #61293
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Allow enums in unmanaged callbacks. #61377

Updated

  • POC src/tests tree test xunit-based source generated runner #60846
    area-Infrastructure
  • Completely lock-free ClassLoader::LookupTypeKey #61346
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Make intrinsic nodes multi op (aka delete `GT_LIST`) #59912
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Wasm marshaler API for user-defined types; migrate Uri and DateTime to new API #47640
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono
  • Use SIMD operations in genCodeForInitBlkUnroll and increase INITBLK_UNROLL_LIMIT to 128 bytes #61030
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Make WeakReferenceCollection thread safe #61054
    area-System.Composition, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Run AOT, and Wasm.Build.Tests on windows #59479
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, Future
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1463994 #61274
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix Array ctor integer widening and add Reflection tests #61347
    area-System.Reflection, 7.0.0
  • [DRAFT][MONO][TEST] Wasm AOT runtime tests #57963
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono, wasm-aot-test
  • [mono] Add mono_class_get_special_jit_flags and MONO_SPECIAL_JIT_DEFER_CLASS_INIT_TO_CTOR #60987
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Support MULX returning ValueTuple #61336
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix BigInteger.Parse returns bogus value for exponents above 1000 #55397
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Add 'w' and 's' bit to xarch instruction flags. #61198
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • JIT: slightly more aggressive tail duplication #61179
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Tracking aot failures, not meant to be merged #52004
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm
  • [JIT] Optimization for left-shift operator #52297
    needs more info, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Pin Platform Manifest file to 6.0.0 Version of the file during servicing #61260
    area-Setup
  • release/6.0.1: Preserve last error in call-counting stubs #60887
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 6.0.1
  • Apply BuiltInComInterop feature switch to managed code #54056
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [TEST ONLY] Test stress build refactor #61311
    * NO MERGE *, NO REVIEW
  • XARCH: Remove redudant tests for GT_LT/GT_GE relops. #61152
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix bug where we reference the entry #0 in the pinned plug queue #60966
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix evaluation of a static class attribute; using current namespace for evaluation #61252
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [tests][mobile] Enable diagnostic_tracing for mobile runtime tests #60879
  • Rewrite selection for fields and always normalize SIMD types in VN #61370
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Fix and optimize llvmonly+gsharedvt code generation #61117
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [Wasm] JS modularization #61313
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • Optimize FMA codegen base on the overwritten #58196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • SPMI no ASMDiff between Checked and Release #61335
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Optimize System.Diagnostics.TraceSource #60464
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Race condition in ResolvePackageAssets leading to InvalidDataException #22538
  • Include `$(RootNamespace)` by default for a project with implicit usings enabled #22535
  • Inconsistent profile selection. `dotnet watch` selects different launch profile when `--no-hot-reload` is given #22531
  • Ubuntu 21.10 wget URL not found! #22530
  • Unable to run net6.0 apps built with snap package on ubuntu 21.10 #22529

Closed

  • FXVersion.TryParse fails to parse version on Thai culture #21518
    6.0.2xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Ensure references added using "Reference" are correctly copied in BlazorWASM projects #22542
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Update Test project x64SolutionBuild to current framework #22532
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0.4xx #22523
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'main' #22510
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1.4xx #22524
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Treat SDK previews as separate workload feature bands #22446
    Area-Workloads
  • Remove reference to PlatformAbstractions #22254
    Servicing-consider
  • Blazor AOT Publish Tests #22477
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-AspNetCore
  • Update the target framework for the test projects #22233
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix `dotnet list package` when current directory contains a `#` character in Unix systems #20449
    Area-NuGet

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Roslyn fails to verify nullabilty after an equality expression with non-lifted struct operator accepting nullable values #57682
    Compiler.Next
  • Configuring IDE0160 code style adds an .editorconfig description referencing the wrong style #57666

Closed

  • IOperation support for interpolated string handler conversions #54505
    17.1
  • IFlowCaptureReferenceOperation.IsInitialization #57484
    17.1
  • [Feature Request] Display compiler errors inline #38589
    17.1.P1
  • How to get ISymbol from CompletionItem #57677
  • [Infra] Test failure Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.CommandLine.UnitTests.CommandLineTests.TestDuplicateAdditionalFiles_WindowsAndMac #57681
  • Inconsistency when using multiple NotNullIfNotNull attributes #57672
  • IDE0170 should be disabled on the positional pattern with property pattern as the nested one #57674
    17.1
  • VS2022 Incorrect edge rendering on Windows 2008 R2 #57670
  • Can't Declare an Inferred Lambda With Optional Arguments #57652

PullRequests

Created

  • Move Default VB Version to 16.9 #57688
    Area-Compilers
  • Revert "Re-enable BuildWithCommandLine test" #57687
    Area-Infrastructure, Test
  • Add basic implementation of new UI #57686
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Handling defaults provided by IAsyncCompletionDefaultsSource #57685
    Area-IDE
  • Remove the hang mitigating timeout from BuildWithCommandLine #57684
    Area-IDE
  • [SourceLink] Use correct encoding for embedded text #57683
    Area-IDE
  • Mitigate the GeneratorDriver missync issue while capturing dumps #57680
    Area-IDE
  • Handle Array/Collection initializers case for implicit object creation analyzer #57679
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Adjust tests for Windows 11 changes #57678
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow xml docs to still be created when 'emit metadata only' is on. #57667
    Area-Compilers
  • Make sure Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Collections builds with net6.0 #57665
    Area-IDE
  • Include a type for NoneOperations in VB, print the type in tests #57664
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #57661
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Cleanup how we create skeleton assemblies. #57655
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Only offer nullable reference types for C# 8 and newer #57668
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix issues in compilation tracker reported in prior PR #57656
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Don't suggest simplification for positional patterns #57676
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #57671
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Don't throw when delay is expedited in tests #57631
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/snappy/nodelay #57070
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Add editor features + rename tracking code action to telemetry table #57669
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to main #57662
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #57663
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Address some PROTOTYPE markers #57318
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Fix #55183: Add SymbolVisitor<TArgument, TResult> #56530
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.1
  • API for getting a deterministic key for a Compilation #57134
    Area-Compilers
  • Port BasicAddMissingReference.InvokeSomeFixesInVisualBasicThenVerifyReferences to the new test framework #57626
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57635
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Check constraints on lifted operator types #57050
    Area-Compilers
  • List patterns: Slice value is assumed to be never null #57457
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Remove CWT from skeleton caching and simplify impl #57658
    Area-IDE
  • Fix generator caching in compiler server #57177
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Use MSBuildLocator for tests #57613
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge features/snappy/nodelay to main-vs-deps #55078
    Area-Infrastructure, Needs UX Triage
  • Fix race condition in computing _hostAnalyzerStateMap #57648
    Area-IDE, Needs Shiproom Approval, 17.0
  • Respond to cancellation when a generator is running, so we can still report time. #57122
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.1
  • Avoid concurrent use of ConditionalWeakTable on net472 #57643
    Area-Compilers
  • Make it possible to analyze the dataflow of `ConstructorInitializerSyntax ` #57576
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • use pair-wise testing on PR validation #57657
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Don't analyze local function bodies as though they are top level code #57623
    Area-IDE
  • Incremental Generator Work Tracking API Implementation #55469
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.1
  • Enable dumps for hung tests #57549
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Regression in AddDataProtection from RC2 #38274
  • First Class Authorization and Token Management Support #38268
    Discussions
  • hotreload breaks blazor webassembly with asp and user defined base path - missing blazor-hotreload.js returns 404 #38267
  • Startup improvement: endpoint #38266
  • Add support for CSS isolation in MVC tag helpers #38265
  • Quarantine StartupTests.ExpandEnvironmentVariableInWebConfig #38260
    Next sprint planning
  • Blazor ValidationMessage issue when using custom validation attributes #38258
  • nullable pragmas cannot be used in .razor / .cshtml files #38257
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly @ 6.0.0 offered by NuGet for .NET 5 project #38256
  • Net Core 6.0 ERR Error running script #38254
  • Code used in .NetConf Day 1 #38253
  • Incorrect nullability warning for razor files #38252
  • ASP.Net 6 custom WebApplicationFactory throws exception #38248
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Connections.Abstractions Version=6.0.0.0 brakes on dependency injection with .Net 5.0 #38246
  • Perf improvement: json_nodejs #38244
  • Model binder does not bind properties with private setter #38243
    Discussions
  • Error when publishing Blazor Hosted Project with a custom web.config #38239

Closed

  • Blazor UI not updated after field update in onclick #38228
  • Consider supporting IJSInProcessRuntime in Blazor Desktop #37647
    Backlog
  • NullReferenceException coming from Razor compiler after upgrade of .NET SDK (without any change to .NET 5 project). #38194
    6.0.x
  • .NET 6 exception incorrectly refers to startup and ConfigureServices #37778
    6.0.1
  • Startup regression: plaintext #38198
  • Startup improvement: https #38199
  • Startup regression: mvc #38224
  • Report the RawConnectionId for HttpSys #37946
    6.0.1
  • Backport template typo fix to 6.0.xxx servicing #37788
    6.0.1
  • I'd like to instruct ASP .NET Core to discover Controllers even if they are nested inside static classes #38250
  • The runtime<->aspnetcore shared src is out of sync #18943
  • Blazor WASM transfer file #38166
  • IActionResult Json return unicode escaped result #38245
  • Blazor Webassembly: Unable to supress URL rewriting #38251
  • Blazor .NET5: SVG text tag not rendered #38155
  • Please implement `IJSUnmarshalledRuntime` for `WebViewJSRuntime` #38242
  • Perf improvement: mvc #38222
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #38223
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Razor.Extensions package dependent on prerelease package #38214
  • Motorola #38241
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.SignalR.Protocol.JsonHubProtocol' threw an exception #38240

PullRequests

Created

  • TESTING AUTOMATION. THIS WON'T BE MERGE #38272
    6.0.x
  • Avoid null ref in TagHelperMatchingConvention when attribute name is null #38271
    Servicing-consider, area-mvc, 6.0.x

Merged

  • Let VS update our solution #38270
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Update Test Failure Template #38263
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Avoid null ref in TagHelperMatchingConvention when attribute name is null #38264
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview1
  • SignOut 2fa remember me cookie when validation fails #38262
    area-identity, 7.0-preview1
  • Use the RawConnectionId for HttpSys #38059
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.1
  • [release/6.0] Only dispose WindowsIdentity in LongPolling #37816
    Servicing-approved, area-signalr, 6.0.1
  • [release/6.0] Use frozen lockfiles with Yarn #37848
    area-signalr, tell-mode, 6.0.1
  • Fix typo in Web API template option description (#37780) #37914
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc, 6.0.1
  • [release/6.0] Add Server2022 to helix matrix & quarantine jobs #37918
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.1
  • Fix groupIdentity in protobuf template #37919
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc, 6.0.1
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `3b49be0` to `16f637f` #37981
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.1
  • Add WebApi-CSharp Template Toggle Description (#37367) #38062
    Servicing-approved, area-web-frameworks, 6.0.1
  • [release/6.0] Improve exception messages referencing startup code #38093
    Servicing-approved, area-security, 6.0.1
  • Quarantine ExpandEnvironmentVariableInWebConfig #38261
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Fix AppHost pack prebuilt usage in source-build #37760
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.1
  • Sync shared code from runtime #38247
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0 #38218
    5.0.x

Updated

  • Enable TrackLinkedCacheEntries for cache tag helpers #38190
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview1
  • Support binding to form and form file parameters in minimal actions #35158
    api-suggestion, community-contribution, feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks
  • Fix Visual Studio 2019 components configuration file #38182
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Update to latest #38231
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-10
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • dotnet-trace ps gives ambiguous information #2282
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Stabilize versioning for tools and fix native asset versioning #2745
  • Use new set of analyzers #2744

Updated

  • Use non-infinite timeout for async connection. #2739

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Using Border throws with a shape of Rectangle #3349
  • [Bug] Pushing to any page inside our controls sample that has a frame causes an exception inside CollectionView #3348
  • [Enhancement] Use TaskCreationOptions.RunContinuationsAsynchronously when creating a TaskCompletionSource #3347
  • [Bug] Platform Extensions are not working on Android #3346
  • MAUI Blazor Template exception on runtime. #3344
  • [Bug] ListView ObservableCollection ItemsSource not updating properly. CollectionView item selection highlight not selecting #3342
  • Convert NUnit unit tests to xUnit #3340
  • [Bug][Android] IllegalStateException on Navigation.PopAsync() #3338
  • [Bug][Android] DisplayAlert does not work with NavigationPage #3335

Closed

  • Unable to use razor files without adding partial class #3301
  • Incorrect error message #821
  • [Bug] visual studio 2022 17.1 preview 1 MAUI project not building #3330

PullRequests

Created

  • Init Essentials #3345
  • CarouselView android handler #3343
  • Fix CodeDom reference #3339
  • [Housekeeping] Border control Device Tests #3334
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮
  • Implement Eval method in WebViewHandler #3331
    area/controls 🎮

Merged

  • Use a non-shared folder for tests #3341
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Added Repo statistics to the readme #3328
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix incorrect error message for accessing `Device.PlatformServices` before `Init()` call #3276
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/migration 🚚
  • [iOS] Fix Shell NavigationBar and TabBar color issues on iOS 15 #3332
    t/bug, area/shell 🐢
  • Multi window close #3295
  • Remove usage of IsolatedStorage #2710
    area/migration 🚚, 6.0.200-preview.11
  • Ensure that AbsoluteLayout measures children at their target sizes #3322

Updated

  • [workload] setup C# implicit global usings from MSBuild #3267
    area/setup 🪄, area/templates 📄
  • Validate and Fix MAUI Navigation Pages against our legacy tests #3329
  • Update issue templates to use GitHub forms (beta) #3320
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Move `IDispatcher` logic out of `IPlatformServices` #2862
    area/controls 🎮, 6.0.200-preview.11
  • Implement RefreshViewHandler on Windows #3299
    area/controls 🎮

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • InMemory: Use deferredOwnedExpansionExpression #26618
  • SqliteConnectionFactory.cs is not thread-safe #26612
  • EF Core 6.0 InvalidOperationException: The object has been removed from the model #26611
  • Re-attaching m2m entities on a skip navigation #26610
  • DbScaffold should honor table names in n:m-relations #26607
  • Not synced data for non-backing filed properties #26606
  • Int64 properties cannot be queried in EntityCore #26603
  • Proxies using Records with a base class broken since .NET 6 #26602

Closed

  • "Operand data type NULL is invalid for max operator" SQL exception with Max group method. #21406
  • Migrations looking for invalid netstandard version after update to EF 3.0 #18645
  • HasOne relationship on Owned type not working as expected with Cosmos #15245
  • Execution of the compiled query with lazy loading throws an exception #14423
  • Certain queries fail to return correct results when compiled with UWP .NET Native #20829
  • Consider relaxing the requirement to project out all properties in relational raw SQL queries #26266
  • Add an IncludeInner method #24955
  • Use <inheritdoc />'s cref attribute for the internal API blurb #24386
  • Scaffold an index from an existing database leads to an ambiguous reference exception #23532
  • Detect and throw if an eagerly initialized entity instance is detected in query #23450
  • Usage of FromSqlRaw/FromSqlInterpolated with param inside HasQueryFilter #23146
  • API for fully resetting a DbContext (ResetState) #23115
  • Enable creation of proxy types for weak entity types #22407
  • Duplicate DBContextOptions registered in DI #22341
  • Consider supporting .netconfig for hierarchical and standard configuration #22203
  • Tools: Script-DbContext should warn when migrations are enabled #22106
  • Materialised views #20858
  • Allow SQL Server aliases to be mapped #20773
  • Support translation of member access on properties mapped by value conversion #20721
  • Add Support for CosmosSerializationOptions in the Cosmos Provider #20670
  • Query: Skip navigations and owned entities #20551
  • Reverse Seeding #20299
  • Support updatable views #20013
  • Linq exception could not be translated has very bad error message. #20001
  • Regression in single context creation perf #19864
  • [question] Expression Rewriting #18244
  • Marshalling code generator warning when building net native UWP app referencing Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Sqlite #24163
  • Crash on UWP when configuring entities with interfaces #22159
  • EF core 3.1 crash on 19H2 and 20H1 UWP apps #20890
  • Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Sqlite.Core release build failure #20638
  • Collection Navigation property without Setter error on UWP #19535
  • Search condition visitor should rewrite to 3-value logic case if UseRelationalNulls = true #19260
  • Cosmos: How to configure DbContext for an infinite/recursive owned entity #18930
  • Scaffolding: Provide a way to initialize a model with business code #17937
  • Allow owned entities on a keyless entity type #17890
  • Consider making it unnecessary to call AsNoTracking() on queries that return owned entities without their owners #17836
  • Cosmos: Add support for Table and Column data annotations #17300
  • Add Internal API to get Core annotations #17202
  • Interpret System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute #17103
  • Performance issue using `.DefaultIfEmpty()` #16764
  • Add Clone or With methods to AlterColumnOperation #16224
  • Make MigrationsModelDiffer:ToReferentialAction protected rather than private #15828
  • Add support for shadow property of IEnumerable<T> with custom conversion of T #15631
  • Preventing Entity Types From Navigating to Query Types is very limiting #15224
  • Relational: Consider always generating distinct column names in final projection (aliasing when needed) #14526
  • Query: Allow providers to influence funcletization on low level #14507
  • Best way to make migrations working on Service Fabric #13969
  • Perf: Avoid boxing values as much as possible #10952
  • Support for ExecuteScalar #9882
  • RC2 Sqlite provider no longer clears temporary files on exit #26422
    6.0.x
  • Remove reference to Relational.Tests from AspNet.Specification tests #26415
    7.0.0
  • Regression in .NET 6 and/or EF Core 6.0: file based Sqlite database file is blocked after use. #26605
  • Exception in SQL server query in EF Core 6, looks related to HasQueryFilter(), worked in EF Core 5 #26428
    6.0.1
  • Non-nullable value comparer can't be applied on nullable type #26429
    6.0.1
  • The `dotnet ef dbcontext scaffold` command does not print all expected logs #26384
    6.0.1
  • EFCore 6 - NullReferenceException upon EnsureDeleted #26436
    6.0.1
  • Scaffolded Many-to-Many properties are generated with incorrect names #26604
  • How to compare 2 type mappings to be equal #26581
  • Consider exposing DatabaseFacade.Clean #26550
  • Change in behavior in EntityTypeExtensions FullName betweeen 5.x and 6.x #26543
  • System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException: Index was out of range when using AsSplitQuery() #26464

PullRequests

Created

  • [6.0.1] Query: Defer inline-ing owned navigation expansion till all joins are… #26617
    Servicing-consider
  • Move to OSX 11.0 for helix queues #26616
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #26620
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Merge release/5.0 to main #26621
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/5.0' => 'main' #26619
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [6.0.1] Move to OSX 11.0 for helix queues #26615
    area-infrastructure
  • [5.0.1] Move to OSX 11.0 for helix queues #26614
    area-infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #26609
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [6.0.1] Microsoft.Data.Sqlite: Clean up on application exit #26529
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #26601
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/3.1' => 'main' #26598
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/5.0' => 'main' #26586
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `sudo` breaks some Linux distro builds using source-build #12634
  • dotnet --list-sdks did not work #12627

PullRequests

Created

  • Flow environment variables into run-build #12637
  • Port #12374 to release/6.0.1xx #12636
  • Port #12374 to release/6.0.2xx #12635
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'main' #12632

Merged

  • [release/6.0.2xx] update Asp.Net templates #12598
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0.2xx #12623
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0.4xx #12624
  • [release/6.0.1xx] update Asp.Net templates #12597
  • GetRuntimeInformation.targets: determine PortableProductMonikerRid based on OSName and Architecture. #12516
  • Update Asp.Net template versions #12599
  • Revert "Enable public tarball CI" #12629
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'main' #12619

Updated

  • Specify depth when updating submodules #12588
  • [release/5.0.4xx] update Asp.Net templates #12596
  • [release/5.0.2xx] update Asp.Net templates #12595
